[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Missing Validation] [No UID Validation] UID created but never validated for uniqueness - can collisions occur? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Missing Validation] [No Deletion Preconditions] Can delete cap without checking for active positions or outstanding debt? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Missing Validation] [No Transfer Restrictions] 'store' ability allows unrestricted transfer - should certain caps be non-transferable? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Business Logic] [Single Owner Model] Each cap has single owner - does this prevent multi-sig or DAO-controlled lending positions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Business Logic] [Parent-Child Purpose] Why do child caps exist if they have same owner as parent? What's the business logic preventing exploits? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Business Logic] [Ownership Transfer] If AccountCap is transferred, should lending positions transfer too or stay with original owner? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Business Logic] [Cap Recovery] If user loses AccountCap, is there recovery mechanism? Or are positions permanently locked? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Protocol Economics] [Fee Evasion] Can attacker delete cap before fees accrue to avoid paying interest on borrows? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Protocol Economics] [Liquidation Avoidance] Can attacker delete cap to prevent liquidation of underwater position causing bad debt? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Protocol Economics] [Position Merging] Multiple caps with same owner - can this be exploited to merge positions and bypass risk parameters? (High)
[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Upgrade] [Module Upgrade] If account module is upgraded, do existing AccountCaps remain valid? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Upgrade] [Breaking Changes] If AccountCap struct is modified in upgrade, can old caps be used causing type confusion? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Migration] [V1 to V2] No migration path defined - how do users migrate positions from old caps to new caps? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Sui-Specific] [Object Ownership] AccountCap has 'key' so it's an object - if it's owned vs shared, how does this affect lending operations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Sui-Specific] [UID to Address] Uses object::uid_to_address - is this cryptographically secure? Can attacker find UID that maps to victim's address? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Sui-Specific] [Dynamic Fields] AccountCap can have dynamic fields via 'store' - can attacker add malicious fields to corrupt cap? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Sui-Specific] [Transfer Rules] No custom transfer policy - should caps have transfer restrictions for security? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Edge Case] [Empty Context] What if TxContext is malformed when creating cap? Can this cause undefined behavior? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Edge Case] [Null UID] Can object::new return null/invalid UID? Would this cause cap creation to succeed with broken state? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Edge Case] [Address Collision] If two UIDs map to same address via uid_to_address, can two caps have same owner causing position collision? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Edge Case] [Maximum Children] Can parent create infinite children causing stack overflow in recursive operations? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Edge Case] [Self-Referencing] Can cap be its own parent creating circular reference? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Edge Case] [Deleted Parent] If parent deleted but child creation in progress, does child creation succeed with orphaned reference? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Volo Vault] [Cap as Collateral] Can AccountCap be used as collateral in volo-vault? If yes, how is value determined? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/account.move] [Volo Vault] [Adaptor Interaction] Can volo-vault adaptors (Navi/Suilend/Cetus) interact with AccountCaps? Could this create custody conflicts? (Critical)
